name: Ahri
title: The Nine-Tailed Fox
description: A mage with powerful crowd control abilities and mobility

p.name: Essence Theft
p.description: Ahri gains a stack of Essence Theft whenever she hits an enemy with an ability. At 3 stacks, she consumes them to heal.

q.name: Orb of Deception
q.description: Ahri throws an orb that damages enemies on the way out and heals her on the way back.

w.name: Fox-Fire
w.description: Ahri releases fox-fire that damages nearby enemies.

e.name: Charm
e.description: Ahri blows a kiss that charms an enemy, slowing and making them vulnerable.

r.name: Spirit Rush
r.description: Ahri dashes forward and releases fox-fire at nearby enemies.

standard.name: Standard Build
standard.description: High damage output with defensive utility

support.name: Support Build
support.description: Focus on team utility and protection

combos.name: Kite and Burst
combos.description: Combo para mantener distancia mientras se inflige daño

combos.name: Full Charm Combo
combos.description: Combo de daño completo después de golpear Charm

tips: Use your Q to farm from distance
Charm is your main CC tool - use it wisely
Your R can be used for both offense and escape
Group with your team for maximum impact
